DOC.brief_summary: To retrospectively investigate relationship Cholinergic Pathways Hyperintensities Scale ( CHIPS ) score change cognitive status Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) patient bilateral subthalamic nucleus deep brain stimulation ( STN DBS ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Study Relationship Between White Matter Hyperintensities ( WMHs ) Within Cholinergic Pathways Cognition PD Patients After Bilateral STN DBS
DOC.detailed_description: In observational study , retrospectively analyze 38 PD patient receive bilateral STN DBS First Affiliated Hospital Sun Yat-sen University year 2008-2012 . All patient evaluate Unified Parkinson 's Disease Rating Scale part III ( UPDRSIII ) operation . Mini-Mental State Examination ( MMSE ) , Montreal Cognitive Assessment ( MoCA ) medication condition pre-operation stimulation medication condition post-operation . The follow-up time point one week pre-operation 6 , 12 , 24 month post-operation . Before operation , white matter hyperintensities（WMHs）in cholinergic pathway determine 3.0 Tesla MRI , use visual rating scale Cholinergic Pathways Hyperintensities Scale ( CHIPS ) . A correlation analysis conduct investigate relationship CHIPS score change cognitive status PD patient bilateral STN DBS retrospectively .
